titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony and to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Authorizes: (1) Suzanne Beede, a Senate employee, to testify in Kofoed v. Swanson-Nunn Electric Company, et al., except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted; and (2) the Senate Legal Counsel to represent her.
